content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaññatthaṃ vā dhanatthaṃ vā, ye hanāma mayaṃ pure;
content.gathalast: Avasesaṃavase taṃavase taṃavase taṃavasesānaṃ bhayaṃ hoti, vedhanti vilapanti ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
content.gathalast: Na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā.
Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, rogānamiva saṅkhaye.
Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā, visaṃ pitvāvapītvāva chaḍḍitaṃ.
Tuṭṭho āyukkhayā hoti, mutto āghātanā yathā.
Ādittāva gharā mutto, maraṇasmiṃ na socati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhati;
content.gathalast: Sabbaṃ anissaraṃ etaṃ, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo taṃ tathā pajānāti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñci, sutattaṃva ayoguḷaṃ.
Passantassa yathābhūtaṃ, na bhayaṃ hoti gāmaṇi.
Mamattaṃ so asaṃvindaṃ, ‘natthi me’ti na socati.
Soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyo, añño ca na bhavissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrena, taṃ karotha yadicchatha;
content.gathalast: Na me tappaccayā tattha, doso pemañca hehiti’’.
content.gatha1: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ;
‘‘Kiṃ bhadante karitvāna, ko vā ācariyo tava;
Sutvāna corā isino subhāsitaṃ, nikkhippa satthāni ca āvudhāni ca;
content.gathalast: Tamhā ca kammā viramiṃsu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayiṃsu.
content.gatha1: Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane, bhāvetva bojjhaṅgabalāni paṇḍitā;
content.gathalast: Udaggacittā sumanā katindriyā, phusiṃsu nibbānapadaṃ asaṅkhatanti.
Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
Na so muccati dukkhamhā, gandhesu adhimucchito.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Manaṃ cetehi dhammehi, yo na sakkoti rakkhituṃ;
‘‘So atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo;
‘‘Yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati;
content.gathalast: Taṃ samādāya vattetha, sā hi ve uttamā rati.
Hantvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṃ.
Pañca pañcahi hantvāna, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
Sabbena sabbaṃ buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Ko so pāraṅgato loke, ko patto amatogadhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissati.
Passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadiyadayadahadi tiṭṭhati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ na passāmi tekicchaṃ, yo metaṃ sallamuddhare;
content.gathalast: Nānārajjena satthenanāraggena na satthena , nāññena vicikicchitaṃ.
Gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassaye.
Te sote ko nivāreyya, taṃ lataṃ ko hi checchati.
Mā te manomayo soto, rukkhaṃva sahasā luve.
Yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ pajaṃ.
content.gatha1: ma. ni. 2.302 ‘‘Passa cittakataṃ bimbaṃ, arukāyaṃ samussitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā;
content.gathalast: Luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti;
content.gathalast: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, aho vatā no amarāti cāhu;
content.gathalast: Vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthenaetena gatthena pahāya bhoge;
content.gathalast: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yena kammaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti manviti (ka.) kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti;
content.gathalast: Appappaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
content.gathalast: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
content.gathalast: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo.
Avajjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ.
Sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: saṃ. ni. 4.95 ‘‘Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Gandhaṃ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Rasaṃ bhotvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Phassaṃ phussa sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Dhammaṃ ñatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
‘‘Na so rajjati rūpesu, rūpaṃ disvā patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati saddesu, saddaṃ sutvā patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati gandhesu, gandhaṃ ghatvā patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati rasesu, rasaṃ bhotvā patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati phassesu, phassaṃ phussa patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rajjati dhammesu, dhammaṃ ñatvā patissato;
content.gatha2: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Khattiyā bhogī rājānobhogā rājānobhogā rājānobhojarājāno , anuyantā bhavanti te;
content.gathalast: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo maṃ icchati anvetu, yo vā nicchati gacchatu;
‘‘Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni;
content.gathalast: Tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṃ pajaṃ.
Pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno’’ti.
Pucchāmi taṃ samaṇa etamatthaṃ, ‘kathaṃ ṭhito tvaṃ ahamaṭṭhitomhi’’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ṭhito ahaṃ aṅgulimāla sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosi, tasmā ṭhitohaṃ tuvamaṭṭhitosi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cirassaṃ vata me mahito mahesī, mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādipaccupādi ;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayuttaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: Icceva coro asimāvudhañca, sobbhe papāte narake anvakāsi akiri (ma. ni. 2.349);
content.gathalast: Avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci buddhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Buddho ca kho kāruṇiko mahesi, yo satthā lokassa sadevakassa;
content.gathalast: ‘Tamehi bhikkhū’ti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
content.gathalast: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
content.gatha1: disā hi (syā. ka., ma. ni. 2.352) ‘‘Disāpi me dhammakathaṃ suṇantu, disāpi me yuñjantu buddhasāsane;
content.gathalast: Disāpi me te manuje bhajantu, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃse, aññaṃ vā pana kañcinaṃkañcinaṃkiñcanaṃkañcanaṃ ;
theragā. 19 ‘‘Udakañhi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayantidamayanti tejanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dāruṃ namayantidamayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
Ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañcinaṃkañcinaṃkiñcanaṃkañcanaṃ .
Appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā;
‘‘Mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho, saṃsaṭṭho yo ca uddhato;
content.gathalast: Tassa dhammā ime honti, pāpakā saṃkilesikā.
Anāsavo ca so hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
content.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
Vasī iddhiguṇe cutūpapāte, kāle passati devatā sa bhikkhu sabhikkhuno (sī. ka.).
Iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnaṃ, aññathā dāni dissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye.
Nibbutā dāni te therā, parittā dāni tādisā.
content.gatha2: Kathaṃ vattentikathā vaḍḍhentikathā vaḍḍhenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
content.gathalast: Piṇḍapāte ca sampanne, ambe āmalakāni ca.
Dhammaṃ paresaṃ desenti, lābhato no ca atthato.
Satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care.
Kiñcāpi pacchimo kālo, phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ.
Gāthāyo dve satā honti, pañcatālīsa 244 gāthāyoyeva dissanti uttarinti.
